properties.areaDesc: Ashe; Watauga; Carroll; Grayson; Floyd; Alleghany
properties.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 19 at 4:26AM EST until January 19 at 6:00PM EST by NWS Blacksburg VA
properties.description:
* WHAT...Northwest winds 15 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph
expected.

* WHERE...In Virginia, Grayson, Carroll and Floyd Counties. In
North Carolina, Ashe, Alleghany NC and Watauga Counties,
especially at elevations above 3000 feet and along the crest of
the southern Blue Ridge.

* WHEN...Until 6 PM EST this evening.

* IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects.
Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may
result.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Use caution along I-81 and I-77 and well as
other north to south routes today. Cross winds will be a hazard
for high-profile vehicles.
properties.instruction:
Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high
profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

NWSheadline: WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM EST THIS EVENING
